1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Term-content calculation.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Run
7  ( CalcTuple, calcTuple,
8    calcCox, calcTree,
9
10    -- * Getting arguments
11    getRightArg1, getRightArg2, getRightArg3,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                 as S
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                   as T
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class             as D
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode            as D
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Build      as D
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Cop        as D
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Cox        as D
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message           as Msg
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Message     as Msg
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Message    as Msg
26
27
28-- --------------------------------------------  Beta reduction
29
30data Beta c
31    = BetaLit  [B.CodePos] c
32      -- ^ Literal content
33    | BetaTerm [B.CodePos] [S.TermName] [S.TermIndex]
34      -- ^ Term reference, its name and position
35    | BetaCall [B.CodePos] S.BlankName (D.CopCalc c) [B.Ab (Beta c)]
36      -- ^ Function application
37
38instance (B.MixEncode c) => Show (Beta c) where
39    show (BetaLit  cp c)     = "BetaLit "  ++ show cp ++ " " ++ B.encode c
40    show (BetaTerm cp ns _ ) = "BetaTerm " ++ show cp ++ " " ++ S.termPathString ns
41    show (BetaCall cp n _ _) = "BetaCall " ++ show cp ++ " " ++ show n
42
43instance B.GetCodePos (Beta c) where
44    getCPs (BetaLit  cp _)      = cp
45    getCPs (BetaTerm cp _ _)    = cp
46    getCPs (BetaCall cp _ _ _)  = cp
47
48-- | Reduce content expression.
49beta :: (B.MixEncode c) => D.CopSet c -> T.Head -> D.Cox c -> B.Ab (Beta c)
50beta copset he cox =
51    do let deriv = D.copsetDerived copset
52       deriv2  <- B.sequenceSnd (pos O.<$$> deriv)
53       cox2    <- pos cox                   -- put term index
54       let cox3 = link copset deriv2 cox2   -- substitute free variables
55       reduce cox3                          -- beta reduction
56    where
57      pos = position he
58
59-- beta reduction, i.e., process CoxBlank and CoxForm1.
60reduce :: forall c. (B.MixEncode c) => D.Cox c -> B.Ab (Beta c)
61reduce = red [] where
62    red :: [D.NamedCox c] -> D.Cox c -> B.Ab (Beta c)
63    red args cox = Msg.abCoxReduce cox $ case cox of
64        D.CoxLit    cp c      -> Right $ BetaLit  cp c
65        D.CoxTerm   cp n i    -> Right $ BetaTerm cp n i
66        D.CoxLocal  _ v k     -> red args =<< kth v k args
67        D.CoxFill   _ fn xs   -> fill args fn $ substL args xs
68        D.CoxCalc   _ _ _     -> fill args cox []
69        D.CoxWith   _ arg2 e  -> red (arg2 ++ args) e
70        D.CoxForm1  _ _ v _   -> Msg.lackArg v
71        D.CoxForm   _ _ _ _   -> Msg.adlib "CoxForm"
72        D.CoxBlank  _ v       -> Msg.unkGlobalVar $ B.name v
73
74    fill :: [D.NamedCox c] -> D.Cox c -> [D.AbCox c] -> B.Ab (Beta c)
75    fill args (D.CoxCalc cp n f) xs =
76                                   do xs2 <- sequence xs
77                                      let xs3 = red args `map` xs2
78                                      Right $ BetaCall cp n f xs3
79    fill args f1 []              = red args f1
80    fill args f1 xxs@(x:xs)      = Msg.abCoxFill (B.getCPs f1) $ case f1 of
81        D.CoxForm1  cp _ v f2   -> do x' <- x
82                                      let vx = (v, D.CoxWith cp args x')
83                                      fill (vx : args) f2 xs
84        D.CoxLocal  _ v k       -> do fn' <- kth v k args
85                                      fill args fn' xxs
86        D.CoxFill   _ f2 xs2    -> fill args f2 $ substL args xs2 ++ xxs
87        D.CoxWith   _ arg2 e2   -> fill (arg2 ++ args) e2 xxs
88        D.CoxBlank  _ n         -> Msg.unkCop $ B.name n
89        _                       -> Msg.unkShow f1
90
91    substL :: [D.NamedCox c] -> [D.Cox c] -> [D.AbCox c]
92    substL = map . subst
93
94    subst :: [D.NamedCox c] -> B.AbMap (D.Cox c)
95    subst args (D.CoxLocal _ v k)    = kth v k args
96    subst args (D.CoxFill cp f xs)   = do f'  <- subst args f
97                                          xs' <- subst args `mapM` xs
98                                          Right $ D.CoxFill cp f' xs'
99    subst _ x                        = Right x
100
101    kth :: String -> Int -> [D.NamedCox c] -> D.AbCox c
102    kth v 0  _    = Msg.unkGlobalVar v
103    kth v k0 args = loop k0 args where
104      loop 1 ((v2, x) : _)
105          | v == v2           =  Right x
106          | otherwise         =  Msg.unmatchBlank v k0 v2 vs
107      loop k (_ : xs)         =  loop (k - 1) xs
108      loop _ []               =  Msg.unkRefVar (v, k0) vs
109
110      vs = map fst args
111
112link :: forall c. D.CopSet c -> [D.NamedCox c] -> O.Map (D.Cox c)
113link copset deriv = li where
114    li cox@(D.CoxBlank _ n)   =  putCp cox $ find n
115    li cox                    =  D.coxCall cox li
116
117    find n    = lookup n fs B.<|> findCont n
118    findCont  = D.copsetFindCalc copset
119
120    putCp cox (Just (D.CoxCalc [] n f))  = D.CoxCalc (B.getCPs cox) n f
121    putCp _   (Just cox) = cox
122    putCp cox (Nothing)  = cox
123
124    fs :: [(S.BlankName, D.Cox c)]
125    fs = map (fmap li . normal) deriv
126
127    normal (n, cop) = (S.BlankNormal n, cop)
128
129-- put term positions for actural heading
130position :: T.Head -> D.Cox c -> D.AbCox c
131position he = spos where
132    spos e = Msg.abCoxPosition e $ pos e
133    pos (D.CoxTerm cp ns _) =
134        let index = T.headIndex1 he ns
135        in if all (>= 0) index
136           then Right $ D.CoxTerm cp ns index
137           else Msg.unkTerm ns he  -- todo: term path
138    pos (D.CoxFill cp f xs)     = do f'  <- spos f
139                                     xs' <- mapM spos xs
140                                     Right $ D.CoxFill cp f' xs'
141    pos (D.CoxForm1 cp tag v e) = do e' <- spos e
142                                     Right $ D.CoxForm1 cp tag v e'
143    pos e = Right e
144
145
146-- --------------------------------------------  Run
147
148-- | [Tuple-to-Content]
149--      Type for tuple-to-content calculation.
150type CalcTuple c = [c] -> B.Ab c
151
152-- | [Cox-to-Tuple-to-Content]
153--     Create tuple calculator from content expression.
154calcTuple :: (D.GetCops cops, D.CContent c) => cops c -> T.Head -> D.Cox c -> CalcTuple c
155calcTuple cops he cox cs = coxRun cs =<< beta (D.getCops cops) he cox
156
157-- | [Tuple-to-Cox-to-Content]
158--     Calculate content expression with specific tuple.
159calcCox :: (D.GetCops cops, D.CContent c) => cops c -> T.Head -> [c] -> D.Cox c -> B.Ab c
160calcCox cops he cs cox = calcTuple (D.getCops cops) he cox cs
161
162-- | [Tree-to-Content]
163--     Calculate token tree as content expression.
164calcTree :: (D.GetCops cops, D.CContent c) => cops c -> D.CalcContent c
165calcTree cops tree =
166    do let cops' = D.getCops cops
167       cox <- D.treeCox cops' tree
168       calcTuple cops' mempty cox []
169
170-- | Calculate content expression.
171coxRun
172  :: forall c. (D.CContent c)
173  => [c]           -- ^ Tuple in body of relation
174  -> Beta c        -- ^ Content expression
175  -> B.Ab c        -- ^ Calculated literal content
176coxRun args = run 0 where
177    run :: Int -> Beta c -> B.Ab c
178    run 1000 _ = B.bug "Too deep expression"
179    run lv cox =
180        let run' = run $ lv + 1
181        in Msg.abCoxCalc cox $ case cox of
182             BetaLit  _ c       -> Right c
183             BetaTerm _ _ [p]   -> Right $ args !!! p
184             BetaTerm _ _ ps    -> term ps args
185             BetaCall _ _ f xs  -> f . map run' =<< sequence xs
186
187    term :: [S.TermIndex] -> [c] -> B.Ab c
188    term []       _ = Msg.adlib "empty term"
189    term (-1 : _) _ = Msg.adlib "negative term"
190    term (p : ps) args2 =
191        let c = args2 !!! p
192        in if D.isRel c
193           then rel ps $ D.gRel c
194           else Right c
195
196    rel :: [S.TermIndex] -> T.Rel c -> B.Ab c
197    rel ps (T.Rel _ args2) =
198        D.putList =<< mapM (term ps) args2
199
200(!!!) :: (B.MixEncode c) => [c] -> S.TermIndex -> c
201list !!! index = loop index list where
202    loop 0 (x : _)  = x
203    loop i (_ : xs) = loop (i - 1) xs
204    loop _ _        = error $ (unwords $ map B.encode list)
205                              ++ " !!! " ++ show index
206
207
208-- --------------------------------------------  getArgN
209
210-- | Extract single non-abortable argument.
211getRightArg1 :: (D.Basis c) => [B.Ab c] -> B.Ab c
212getRightArg1 [Right x] = Right x
213getRightArg1 cs = Msg.badArg cs
214
215-- | Extract two non-abortable arguments.
216getRightArg2 :: (D.Basis c) => [B.Ab c] -> B.Ab (c, c)
217getRightArg2 [Right x, Right y] = Right (x, y)
218getRightArg2 cs = Msg.badArg cs
219
220-- | Extract three non-abortable arguments.
221getRightArg3 :: (D.Basis c) => [B.Ab c] -> B.Ab (c, c, c)
222getRightArg3 [Right x, Right y, Right z] = Right (x, y, z)
223getRightArg3 cs = Msg.badArg cs
224
